synopsis.text: The story follows Shiina Kazuya, a selfless teenager who sacrifices his life to save young girls from a convenience store attack. He awakens in a world brimming with magic and swords, reincarnated as Cain von Silford, the third son of a noble family. Retaining his Earth memories, Cain embraces his new reality with enthusiasm, only to discover that the gods have granted him extraordinary abilities during his fifth birthday baptism. With stats and boosts that far outshine others, Cain must navigate the complexities of society while concealing his true abilities, all the while exploring the darkest dungeons and pursuing his dreams of becoming a great adventurer. As he embarks on his thrilling journey, Cain must uncover the gods' plans for him and determine his destiny in this captivating isekai adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
